name: Snapmod - Better Screenshots mockup generator
description: Snapmod lets you to easily add your screenshots into device frames. You can use it to share your screenshots, wallpapers or apps mockups.   Features:  - A variety of the latest models, different color frames, and more to come  - Automatic effectExtract primary color or Gaussian blur  - Clean and simple interface design by Material Design 2  - Excellent performance, smooth experience     Google: Nexus 5, Nexus 5X, Nexus 6, Pixel, Pixel 2, Pixel 2 XL   OnePlus: 3T, 5, 5T, 6  Samsung: Note 5, Note 8, Note 9, S5, S7, S8, S9  SONY: Xperia XS, XZ, XZ P, XZ1, XZ1 C, XZ2, XZ2 C, XZ3  LG: V30  Huawei: Mate 10, 20 Lite, RS  Xiaomi: Mi 6, Mi 8, Mix 2s  Meizu: 15, 16, mblu E3, MX 5, Pro 5  HTC: U11, U11+, U12+  OPPO: R15, R17  VIVO: NEX, X21, X23  Motorola: Moto Z, Z2 Force, Z3, P30  Lenovo: S5  Smartisan: Pro  Essential: PH-1  Apple: iPhone8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone X
